attr.title: Fables of Talumos
attr.desc: Fables of Talumos is a pixel-art adventure game set in the fantasy world of Talumos. The game has fast-paced and challenging combat, interesting characters, powerful weapons and items, and a unique fantasy setting.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam or Itch. For Steam version, copy all game files into the assets folder. For Itch version, download the zip with the game and extract all files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1085570/Fables_of_Talumos) or [Itch](https://cheesemaster-games.itch.io/fables-of-talumos). For `Steam` version, copy all game files into the `assets` folder. For `Itch` version, download the zip with the game and extract all files into the `assets` folder.
